resources.string: To connect to a new phone, the Gear will be reset to its factory settings.
The Gear setup is not complete. The setup wizard is currently open on the Gear, but to connect to the Gear, you need to open the Setup wizard in Gear Manager on this phone, too.
Forward calls from your Bluetooth-connected phone to your Gear. This uses your data plan.
Enter phone name.
Find My Phone
If you back up your data now, the current Gear backup data on the mobile phone will be replaced by your latest Gear data.

"Use your mobile phone storage to back up the following %1$s data: %2$s
If you previously backed up your %3$s data, you can restore it to your %4$s now.
This may take some time depending on the size of the files."
Your mobile phone is now scanning for your Gear. This will take several minutes. It may be difficult to locate your Gear if it is indoors.
Block alerts from appearing on the Gear while your phone is being used.
Unable to turn on Restrict notifications on your Gear. No screen lock is set on your mobile phone.

When your Gear is not connected to your mobile phone via Bluetooth, you must sign in to your Samsung account to receive notifications and use applications that require a connection. This uses your data plan.
%1$s is not installed on your phone. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your phone. You will be taken to the download screen.
%1$s is not installed on your phone. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your phone. You will be taken to the download screen.
%1$s has been uninstalled from your phone. To use %2$s on your Gear, download %1$s to your phone.

"Sound and vibration alerts for application notifications will follow the relevant settings on your phone.
While your Gear is in use, your notifications will be shown as small pop-ups at the top of the screen, regardless of your selection above.
This will not apply to instant alerts, such as those for incoming calls."

When your Gear and mobile phone are connected, Send help messages helps you in an emergency. It alerts your emergency message contacts to your situation by sending them emergency messages with your location. Sending these messages uses your data plan. To turn on Send help messages during an emergency, press the power key %d times.

When your Gear and mobile phone are connected, Send help messages helps you in an emergency by taking a picture using the Gear camera. It alerts your emergency message contacts to your situation by sending them emergency messages with this picture and your location. The first message will contain both your location and the picture. Then, after an interval, a second message will be sent containing only your location. Sending these messages uses your data plan. To turn on Send help messages during an emergency, press the home key %d times.
View content from your Gear on your mobile phone by picking up your mobile phone.
Protect your phone from harmful content by improving its security and service.
I agree that Mobile data may be used and that multimedia text messages may be sent in emergencies. I understand that this uses my data plan.
User guide
